findTags.description: Retrieves all tags, or retrieves all tags with a name or description matching a given text fragment

mergeTags.description: Merges one or more tags into another tag

parameters.newName: The name of the destination tag

getTagsByCampaign.description: Retrieves all tags for a given campaign

associateTagsWithCampaign.description: Associates tags to a given campaign

disassociateTagFromCampaign.description: Disassociates a given tag from a given campaign
